scripts.firefox: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.chromium: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.webkit: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=webkit
scripts.test: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test-headed: npm run clean && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test-debug: npm run clean && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test-ui: npm run clean && npx playwright test --ui
